synopsis.text: Together with his extraordinary ability to locate hidden hot springs, Kouzou Yukawa embarks on a mission to bring prosperity to a small town. However, a tragic fall leads to his untimely demise, only to be revived by an Inari deity in a mystical world. Accompanied by the deity's messenger princess, Mayudama, Kouzou continues his quest for the perfect hot spring. But, his first encounter with a hot spring in this new world is interrupted by an elf girl's sudden attack! After resolving the misunderstanding, Kouzou sets out to spread the joy and healing power of hot springs, bringing people together and forging new friendships in this magical realm.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
